mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.consignee_name AS "consigneeName", a.province AS "province", a.city AS "city", a.district AS "district", a.detail_addr AS "detailAddr", a.address AS "address", a.mobile_phone AS "mobilePhone", a.telephone AS "telephone", a.default_flag AS "defaultFlag", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.merchant_id AS "merchantId", u11.name AS "user.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u11 ON u11.id = a.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO consignee_addr( consignee_name, province, city, district, detail_addr, address, mobile_phone, telephone, default_flag, user_id, remarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, merchant_id ) VALUES ( #{consigneeName}, #{province}, #{city}, #{district}, #{detailAddr}, #{address}, #{mobilePhone}, #{telephone}, #{defaultFlag}, #{user.id}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{merchantId} )

INSERT INTO consignee_addr
consignee_name,
province,
city,
district,
detail_addr,
address,
mobile_phone,
telephone,
default_flag,
user_id,
remarks,
create_by,
create_date,
update_by,
update_date,
del_flag,
merchant_id,

#{province},

#{district},

mapper.update: UPDATE consignee_addr SET consignee_name = #{consigneeName}, province = #{province}, city = #{city}, district = #{district}, detail_addr = #{detailAddr}, address = #{address}, mobile_phone = #{mobilePhone}, telephone = #{telephone}, default_flag = #{defaultFlag}, user_id = #{user.id}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, merchant_id = #{merchantId} WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE consignee_addr
consignee_name = #{consigneeName},
province = #{province},
city = #{city},
district = #{district},
detail_addr = #{detailAddr},
address = #{address},
mobile_phone = #{mobilePhone},
telephone = #{telephone},
default_flag = #{defaultFlag},
user_id = #{user.id},
remarks = #{remarks},
update_by = #{updateBy.id},
update_date = #{updateDate},
merchant_id = #{merchantId},
WHERE id = #{id}
